ANSWER: Compensation can be claimed by all holders of myki passes or myki Money.
Your myki must have been touched on Metro trains on at least 10 days of that month.

YOUR QUESTION: How much will I be compensated?
ANSWER: The value of a daily ticket (or other value as defined) will be uploaded onto your myki. The value loaded will reflect the same fare/zone mix as the myki pass being compensated.
In the event that Metro Trains has not met its target, an online form will be available on this page to apply for compensation. Click here to see if you are eligible for compensation

YOUR QUESTION: When do I need to claim by?
ANSWER: Up until the end of the month in which the results of the previous month are announced.
